com.pega.pegarules.pub.context

Interface IDesignTemplateUtils


  • public interface IDesignTemplateUtils
    Utilities interface for supporting design templating of section rules.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String VERSION 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildRegions(ClipboardPage ruleformPage)
      Builds list of regions for a design template.
      void buildRegions(PublicAPI tools, ClipboardPage ruleformPage)
      Builds list of regions for a design template.
      boolean canConvertToTemplatedSection(ClipboardPage mainSection)
      returns false if section contains only repeating structure or has a dynamic or ajax container Following logic is used in the implementation --- set default errorcode(pyErrorCode) as 0 on the main section to track the following 2 cases 1) when there is only repeating structures the errorcode is set to 1 2) when there is Ajax or Dynamic container type then errorcode is set to 2 set default flag (pzIsEditEnabled) to false to track the presence of valid cell when there is a valid cell then the repeating structure message will not be honored
      void changeDesignTemplateRegions(PublicAPI tools, ClipboardPage newDesignTemplatePage, ClipboardPage primary) 
      void convertRegionToSectionModel(ClipboardPage content, ClipboardPage designTemplate)
      Used to convert a section from using a template.
      void convertRegionToSectionModel(PublicAPI tools, ClipboardPage content, ClipboardPage designTemplate)
      Used to convert a section from using a template.
      boolean convertToTemplatedSection(ClipboardPage sectionToConvert)
      Convert given non-templated section to templated section
      IDesignTemplateEditing getDesignTemplateEditing()
      Accessor for grabbing a reference to the DesignTemplateEditing interface
      boolean isCellPresentInSection(ClipboardPage sectionToSearch, java.lang.String currentValue)
      determines if the passed in section contains the passed in currentValue as in pyValue in one of the cells of the section
      void mergeModels(ClipboardPage content, ClipboardPage designTemplate)
      Combines a content section page with a design template page to result in a standard section page.

    • Method Detail

      • mergeModels

        void mergeModels(ClipboardPage content,
                 ClipboardPage designTemplate)
        Combines a content section page with a design template page to result in a standard section page. Copies the content's cells from the regions to corrected location defined as the matching region.
        Parameters:
        content - The clipboard page for a content section.
        designTemplate - The clipboard page for a design template section.

      • mergeModels

        void mergeModels(PublicAPI tools,
                 ClipboardPage content,
                 ClipboardPage designTemplate)
        Combines a content section page with a design template page to result in a standard section page. Copies the content's cells from the regions to corrected location defined as the matching region.
        Parameters:
        tools - A reference to the PublicAPI
        content - The clipboard page for a content section.
        designTemplate - The clipboard page for a design template section.

      • convertRegionToSectionModel

        void convertRegionToSectionModel(ClipboardPage content,
                                 ClipboardPage designTemplate)
        Used to convert a section from using a template. Combines a content section page with a design template page to result in a standard section page. Copies the content's cells from the regions to corrected location defined as the matching region. Cleans up region data.
        Parameters:
        content - The clipboard page for a content section.
        designTemplate - The clipboard page for a design template section.

      • convertRegionToSectionModel

        void convertRegionToSectionModel(PublicAPI tools,
                                 ClipboardPage content,
                                 ClipboardPage designTemplate)
        Used to convert a section from using a template. Combines a content section page with a design template page to result in a standard section page. Copies the content's cells from the regions to corrected location defined as the matching region. Cleans up region data.
        Parameters:
        tools - A reference to the PublicAPI
        content - The clipboard page for a content section.
        designTemplate - The clipboard page for a design template section.

      • buildRegions

        void buildRegions(ClipboardPage ruleformPage)
        Builds list of regions for a design template.
        Parameters:
        ruleformPage - The top level page of the section rule.

        Builds list of regions for a design template.

        primary - The primary section page

      • moveCellToRegion

        void moveCellToRegion(PublicAPI tools,
                      ClipboardPage cellPage,
                      ClipboardPage sectionPage)
        Takes the given cell and places it in the correct region
        Parameters:
        tools - A reference to the PublicAPI
        cellPage - The page contains the cell data to be added to the section page's region
        sectionPage - The primary section page which contains data regarding the regions

      • getDesignTemplateEditing

        IDesignTemplateEditing getDesignTemplateEditing()
        Accessor for grabbing a reference to the DesignTemplateEditing interface
        Returns:
        reference an instance of the DesignTemplateEditing interface (IDesignTemplateEditing)

      • isCellPresentInSection

        boolean isCellPresentInSection(ClipboardPage sectionToSearch,
                               java.lang.String currentValue)
        determines if the passed in section contains the passed in currentValue as in pyValue in one of the cells of the section
        Parameters:
        sectionToSearch - the section to search in (loops over regions and cells)
        currentValue - the value to search for that matches the .pyValue property
        Returns:
        true if the current value was found in the section passed in

      • convertToTemplatedSection

        boolean convertToTemplatedSection(ClipboardPage sectionToConvert)
        Convert given non-templated section to templated section
        Parameters:
        sectionToConvert - the section to be converted to a templated section
        Returns:
        true if the section converted successfully

      • canConvertToTemplatedSection

        boolean canConvertToTemplatedSection(ClipboardPage mainSection)
        returns false if section contains only repeating structure or has a dynamic or ajax container Following logic is used in the implementation --- set default errorcode(pyErrorCode) as 0 on the main section to track the following 2 cases 1) when there is only repeating structures the errorcode is set to 1 2) when there is Ajax or Dynamic container type then errorcode is set to 2 set default flag (pzIsEditEnabled) to false to track the presence of valid cell when there is a valid cell then the repeating structure message will not be honored
        Parameters:
        mainSection - - section to search for dynamic or ajax container or if it has only repeating structure
        Returns:
        false if section contains only repeating structure or has a dynamic or ajax container
